content: snuggle fingerless gloves all rights reserved © 2023 hava some yarn personal use only snuggle fingerless gloves are worked cable chart key in the round with a simple repeated cable pattern on the back of the hand this pattern is perfect for an adventurous beginner looking to learn how to cable and create a gusset gauge back of hand chart 4 stitches x 5 row = 1 in square in stockinette materials 100 yards worsted weight yarn instructions pictured yarn - purl soho patridge lilac co 28 sts morning join in the round taking care not to twist scrap yarn for holding thumb stitches pm to mark the beginning of round 3 stitch markers follow the back of hand chart for all stitches on the tapestry needle back of the hand and knit all palm stitches size 7 / 4 5mm double pointed needles or round 1 row 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end of round size needed to obtain gauge round 2 row 2 of chart k1 p2 c2b c2f p2 k to end of round abbreviations round 3 - 5 row 3 - 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end co cast on of round k knit round 6 row 2 of chart k1 p2 c2b c2f p2 k to end of round k2tog knit two together round 7 - 9 row 3 - 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end pm place marker of round sl m slip marker round 10 row 2 of chart k1 p2 c2b c2f p2 k to c2b cable 2 back end of round c2f cable 2 front round 11 - 13 row 3 - 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to m1l make 1 left m1r make 1 right end of round all rights reserved © 2023 hava some yarn personal use only round 14 row 2 of chart k1 p2 c2b c2f p2 k to end of round round 15 - 17 row 3 - 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end of round round 18 row 2 of chart k1 p2 c2b c2f p2 k to end of round round 19 - 21 row 3 - 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end of round glove should measure 3 from cast on edge for left glove thumb gusset round 22 row 2 of chart k1 p2 cb2 cf2 p2 k12 pm m1r k1 m1l pm k to end of round 3 thumb stitches between markers for right glove thumb gusset round 22 row 2 of chart k1 p2 cb2 cf2 p2 k3 pm m1r k1 m1l pm k to end of round 3 thumb stitches between markers for both the right and left glove continue in pattern as follows round 23-24 row 3 - 4 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end of round round 25 row 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to first maker sl
